data.title: J.J. Redick
data.meta_description: #86 J.J. Redick on the 2018 The World's Highest-Paid Athletes - After four years with the Los Angeles Clippers, Redick joined the Philadelphia 76ers last
data.text:
Stocks Suffer Second Day Of Significant Declines And A Global Software Outage Hits Overnight

Stocks tumble; S&P 500 drops 0.8%, Nasdaq down 0.7%. Rising volatility sees VIX up 28%. Software outage hits stocks, CrowdStrike falls 10%. Political and earnings season anxieties grow.

Small Cap Stocks Continue To Shine

S&P 500 hits 38th record high as gains spread beyond tech. Russell 2000 outperforms Nasdaq with five-day streak. Optimism grows for strong earnings and potential rate cuts.

Weekend Political Violence Could Shake Up Market

Earnings season continues this week with Goldman Sachs out this morning. We'll hear from Fed members all week as investors anticipate a rate cut coming.

Stocks Stage Big Reversal To End Day Lower

S&P 500 falls 0.88% after CPI report, ending six-day streak. Tech stocks drop sharply. Russell 2000 and bonds rally. Hopes for September rate cut rise to 93% post-CPI report.

Powell Testimony And Tesla Drive Market Gains

The S&P 500 hit another record high driven by non-tech stocks. Powell hints at rate cut due to weak labor market. Watching CPI report and financial stocks.

Powell Set To Testify, CPI And Earnings Kick-Off

Stocks closed at record highs on Friday; S&P 500 up 0.5%, Nasdaq up 3.5%. Boeing faces legal fallout for 737 MAX crashes; Powell to testify this week.

Jobs Numbers Are Mixed While Tesla Continues Its Run

Saks Fifth Avenue is buying Neiman Marcus. Tesla gets approval for Chinese government officials. And bitcoin is cratering. For a post holiday Friday, markets are not lacking news.

Stocks Indicated Slightly Lower Ahead Of July 4th Holiday

Despite modest gains for equity indices, shares of Tesla and other Magnificent Seven stocks have been strong going back to the start of May.

Second Half Of The Year Begins - Can Nvidia And AI Continue Their Momentum?

Stocks are heading into the second half of the year with impressive gains. The Magnificent 7 currently account for 60% of the gains in the S&P 500.

More Questions Than Answers From Last Night's Debate And Today's PCE Index

After closing higher for the third day in a row, a lackluster debate and PCE Index report that was in line with expectations has markets relatively quiet ahead of the upcoming holiday-shortened week.

Nvidia Shares Rebound As Tech Stocks Jump

Shares of Nvidia surged on Tuesday, helping to push markets higher. FedEx beat on earnings and chipmaker Micron will report after the close today.

Los Angeles Lakers Hire JJ Redick As Next Head Coach, Fourth In Past 6 Years

The Los Angeles Lakers are hiring JJ Redick to be their next head coach.

Vikings Secure Quarterback, But J.J. McCarthy Must Take Charge Of Opportunity

The Minnesota Vikings had high hopes of coming out of Day 1 of the NFL Draft with an elite quarterback.

Vikings QB1 Choice Likely Will Come Down To Drake Maye Or J.J. McCarthy

The die was cast with this team when the Vikings said goodbye to Kirk Cousins and had no issues with him leaving the team and signing a four-year, $180 million deal wi...

Vikings Likely To Make Moves For J.J. McCarthy After Trade With Texans

It is fairly clear that the Vikings are going to draft a quarterback, and they now have the capital to move up.
